import React from 'react' const FilmDetails = (props) => { let details; const backdropUrl = `https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w1280/${props.film.backdrop_path}` const posterUrl = `https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w780/${props.film.poster_path}` details = (

{props.film.tagline}

{props.film.overview}

) return (

Details

{details}
) } export default FilmDetails
